T02TD3723E:36a-0: @36a * // spyi'i dam tshig mdor bsdus pa bzhugs so /
T02TD3723E:36a-3: de ltar ston pa mchod byas nas //
T02TD3723E:36a-4: lam gyi rnal 'byor rnams don phyir //
T02TD3723E:36a-5: rgyud gsum nges par gsal byed pa'i //
T02TD3723E:36a-6: dam tshig chen po mdor bshad bya //
T02TD3723E:36a-7: lam gyi rgyud la zhugs rnams kyis //
T02TD3723E:36a-8: bslab pa gsum la gnas byas nas //
T02TD3723E:36a-9: don gnyis mngon du byed pa yang //
T02TD3723E:36a-10: nang rigs la la mun snang bzhin //
T02TD3723E:36a-11: gcig gis 'thad pa ma yin la //
T02TD3723E:36a-12: la la cha mthun spyod pa'i rigs //
T02TD3723E:36a-13: gdul bya skas kyi rim spyod pa ;
T02TD3723E:36a-14: / sangs rgyas mdzad pa de gsungs so //
T02TD3723E:36a-15: gnyer 'di lung gis lus gzhag pa //
T02TD3723E:36a-16: ngo bo rnam grangs bsrung thabs dang //
T02TD3723E:36a-17: nyams rgyu snga rtags skyon yon gnyis //
T02TD3723E:36a-18: skong thabs dpe dang mdo bcur bshad //
T02TD3723E:36a-19: ngo bo rtsa ba bzhi dang ni //
T02TD3723E:36a-20: thun min thun mong yan lag gnyis //
T02TD3723E:36a-21: rtsa ba chen po mdor 'brel pa'o //
T02TD3723E:36a-22: dam tshig rnam pa'i grangs dag ni //
T02TD3723E:36a-23: sems can grangs dang log rtog grangs //
T02TD3723E:36a-24: sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi mkhyen phyir //
T02TD3723E:36a-25: rtog 'dul gnyen po dam tshig grangs //
T02TD3723E:36a-26: rgyal ba nyid kyis brjod las 'das //
T02TD3723E:36a-27: 'on kyang rmongs pa'i mdo bzung na //
T02TD3723E:36a-28: byang chub sems gnyis slob dpon drug / mched bzhi sngags gsum phyag rgya bzhi //
T02TD3723E:36a-29: gsang bcu rtsa bar shes par bya //
T02TD3723E:36a-30: spyad pa lnga dang mi spang lda //
T02TD3723E:36a-31: dang du blang dang sgrub de bzhin //
T02TD3723E:36a-32: shes bya lnga rnams thun mong bshad //
T02TD3723E:36a-33: nyid lag skabs su shes par bya //
T02TD3723E:36a-34: thun mong dam tshig mtha' yas pa //
T02TD3723E:36a-35: mdor bsdus bdag gzhan don gnyis po //
T02TD3723E:36a-36: rnam grangs skabs su shes bar bya'o //
T02TD3723E:36a-37: bsrung ba'i thabs ni 'di lta ste //
T02TD3723E:36a-38: rang lus rgyal ba'i phyag rgya cher //
T02TD3723E:36a-39: sems can khams kyang der shes shing //
T02TD3723E:36a-40: snang stong gnyis med ye shes sku //
T02TD3723E:36b-0: byas mthong zos pa thams @36b cad la //
T02TD3723E:36b-1: sems phyir gang yang byas snang med //
T02TD3723E:36b-2: dran pa shes bzhin sngon btang la //
T02TD3723E:36b-3: dus gsum rgyun du ma dran na //
T02TD3723E:36b-4: theg chen sngags par ci ste tshud //
T02TD3723E:36b-5: lta spyod dam tshig 'brel pa yi //
T02TD3723E:36b-6: spyi dang 'dren dang dam tshig dbang //
T02TD3723E:36b-7: nyams chags skong dang shes rgyud 'grol //
T02TD3723E:36b-8: man ngag lung gi slob dpon rnams //
T02TD3723E:36b-9: lus la dbang ba'i rgyal po dang //
T02TD3723E:36b-10: kho bo ma dang pa dang mig / snying bas lhag pa'i tshul bltas te //
T02TD3723E:36b-11: sgo gsum zol sgyu med pa yis //
T02TD3723E:36b-12: yi dam lha ltar rgyun du bsam //
T02TD3723E:36b-13: bsrung rim 'chad pa bzhin shes bya //
T02TD3723E:36b-14: mtha' yas sems can rang rig phyir //
T02TD3723E:36b-15: gang yang bdag las gzhan med dang //
T02TD3723E:36b-16: bde gshegs snying pos spun yin phyir //
T02TD3723E:36b-17: ma 'ongs sangs rgyas rang bzhin no //
T02TD3723E:36b-18: spyi yi mched de pha tshan bzhin //
T02TD3723E:36b-19: sangs rgyas chos bzhugs ring ba dang //
T02TD3723E:36b-20: lta spyod mthun pa nye bar bshad //
T02TD3723E:36b-21: pha gcig dam tshig gang 'dres pa'i //
T02TD3723E:36b-22: nang tshan pha spun spun bas kyang //
T02TD3723E:36b-23: lhag par bltas te bsrung ba ni //
T02TD3723E:36b-24: lus kyi zas nor mnyes bya ba //
T02TD3723E:36b-25: sbur ma lta bur phongs pa med //
T02TD3723E:36b-26: gdan gding khur sogs las bya ba //
T02TD3723E:36b-27: bran bzhin nges bar dang du blang //
T02TD3723E:36b-28: bla ma'i rigs 'khor de bzhin no //
T02TD3723E:36b-29: nor rdzas blangs ba'i rnam smin phyir //
T02TD3723E:36b-30: til 'bru tsam yang ma 'bag cig / mal gos phyags sogs bgom mi bya //
T02TD3723E:36b-31: mchod rten bshig dang 'dra bar gsungs //
T02TD3723E:36b-32: brdeg gsod rku 'phrog bsdo ba ni //
T02TD3723E:36b-33: dngos su bya ba ci smos kyi //
T02TD3723E:36b-34: rtsed mo'i las su'ang bya ba min //
T02TD3723E:36b-35: dag gis skyon spangs yon tan bsgrags //
T02TD3723E:36b-36: tshul brjod pas ni nyams par 'gyur //
T02TD3723E:36b-37: sgro skur la sogs mtshan nyid can //
T02TD3723E:36b-38: bre mo gtam yang zur mi bya //
T02TD3723E:36b-39: yid kyis g-yo sgyu phrag dog dag / ngan sems 'phya sems nor la brkam //
T02TD3723E:36b-40: se gol yul du'ang bya ba min //
T02TD3723E:36b-41: shin tu'ang brtse zhing gdung bar bya //
T02TD3723E:36b-42: spyod lam cis kyang mnyes byed cing //
T02TD3723E:36b-43: bka' yi zur yang mi gcod pa //
T02TD3723E:36b-44: de ni ldog par ma gsungs so //
T02TD3723E:36b-45: rtsa ba bskyed dang las sngags kyis //
T02TD3723E:36b-46: dam tshig las dang chos dang ni //
T02TD3723E:36b-47: sku gnyis phyag rgya chen po bzhi //
T02TD3723E:36b-48: rang gi sgo gsum yi dam gyi //
T02TD3723E:37a-2: rtag tu bzlas pa byed pa ni //
T02TD3723E:37a-3: byang chub gzung la zhugs pa yin //
T02TD3723E:37a-4: rab kyis chu bo'i rgyun bzhin nam //
T02TD3723E:37a-5: nyin gsum mtshan gsum gnyis gcig tu //
T02TD3723E:37a-6: ma yengs par ni gang gis bzlas //
T02TD3723E:37a-7: 'bring gis zla gcig dus drug tu //
T02TD3723E:37a-8: dus bzhi bar du mi bcad cing //
T02TD3723E:37a-9: tha ma spyad pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD3723E:37a-10: zla re'am ra ba'i dus dag tu //
T02TD3723E:37a-11: brtson pas 'bad de mi byed pa //
T02TD3723E:37a-12: byang chub sa bon rlag pa yin //
T02TD3723E:37a-13: tshogs dang gtor ma de bzhin te //
T02TD3723E:37a-14: tha na lo zla mi bzla'o //
T02TD3723E:37a-15: lta zab spyod pa brlang po dang //
T02TD3723E:37a-16: lha yi gzugs dang grub rtags dang //
T02TD3723E:37a-17: spyir gsang rnam pa bzhir bshad do //
T02TD3723E:37a-18: sgrub pa'i gnas dus grogs dang rdzas //
T02TD3723E:37a-19: rab tu gsang la bsgrub par bya'o //
T02TD3723E:37a-20: gsang bar 'os pa mdor bsdu na //
T02TD3723E:37a-21: phud dang gtor ma tshogs dag dang //
T02TD3723E:37a-22: bhandha phur pa mar me'i snod //
T02TD3723E:37a-23: rdzas dang la ga cha dkyil 'khor dang //
T02TD3723E:37a-24: skye bos mthong bar yongs mi bya //
T02TD3723E:37a-25: dril bu rde'u chung la sogs sgra //
T02TD3723E:37a-26: skye bos thos par yongs mi brdung //
T02TD3723E:37a-27: grogs po'i spyod dang mtshang rnams dang //
T02TD3723E:37a-28: sems can kun gyi ra na spyod rnams //
T02TD3723E:37a-29: shin tu gsang na byang chub rgyu //
T02TD3723E:37a-30: gnyer gtad pa yi gdams pa ste //
T02TD3723E:37a-31: sngar bshad slob dpon ched kyis so //
T02TD3723E:37a-32: gsang sngags skyon yod ma yin te //
T02TD3723E:37a-33: sems can don phyir shin tu gsang //
T02TD3723E:37a-34: gsang thub dngos grub mi yal bas //
T02TD3723E:37a-35: gsang phyir gdams dag sna tshogs gsungs //
T02TD3723E:37a-36: dam nyams dam las log pa dang //
T02TD3723E:37a-37: dam med dkyil 'khor ma mthong zhing //
T02TD3723E:37a-39: sems kyis bstan par mi bya zhing //
T02TD3723E:37a-40: lus kyis thams cad sbas la gzhag / dag gis rdo rje lce yod kyang //
T02TD3723E:37a-41: brjod pa dag tu bya ba med //
T02TD3723E:37a-42: de dag rtsa ba bzhir bshad do //
T02TD3723E:37a-43: thun mong yan lag bshad bya ba ;
T02TD3723E:37a-44: / sgrol sbyor ma byin len pa dang //
T02TD3723E:37a-45: brdzun smra ngag rtsub spyod pa lnga //
T02TD3723E:37a-46: rang bzhin gyis ni sbyor sgrol dang //
T02TD3723E:37a-47: dbang po'i yul du sbyor sgrol dang //
T02TD3723E:37a-48: ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor sgrol dang //
T02TD3723E:37a-49: thabs chen po yi sbyor sgrol dang //
T02TD3723E:37a-50: sngon du bya ba'i sbyor sgrol lnga'o //
T02TD3723E:37b-0: gnyis ni shes bya'i thun mong @37b bshad //
T02TD3723E:37b-1: ting 'dzin bslab pa thun mong gsum //
T02TD3723E:37b-2: dngos phyung dam tshig chen po la //
T02TD3723E:37b-3: byed pa'i tshig lngar shes par bya //
T02TD3723E:37b-5: dkon mchog slob dpon sku dgra gnyis //
T02TD3723E:37b-6: dam nyams log dang 'khus pa dang //
T02TD3723E:37b-8: / dam sri ngan pa'i ngang tshul can //
T02TD3723E:37b-9: ngan song gsum dang bcu po ni //
T02TD3723E:37b-10: rnal 'byor kun gyis dang du blang //
T02TD3723E:37b-11: grangs ni rtsa ba bcu bzhi'o //
T02TD3723E:37b-12: ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya rnams //
T02TD3723E:37b-13: shin tu goms pas dbang bsgyur te //
T02TD3723E:37b-14: byang chub zhing du dgod par bya //
T02TD3723E:37b-15: ting 'dzin sngags rgyas bag chags sbyang //
T02TD3723E:37b-16: rnam shes lhar bskyed dbang bskur 'phang //
T02TD3723E:37b-17: ye shes tshogs kyang rdzogs par 'gyur //
T02TD3723E:37b-18: phung po byin brlabs mchod pa bsngo //
T02TD3723E:37b-20: de ltar bsgral ba'i dgos ched kyang //
T02TD3723E:37b-21: byang chub spyod 'phel sems can bde //
T02TD3723E:37b-22: lha mnyes bdag gi dam skong zhing //
T02TD3723E:37b-23: las ngan bar chad sdug yun thung //
T02TD3723E:37b-24: rang gis bsags med ngan song la //
T02TD3723E:37b-25: bde lam 'di las gzhan med do //
T02TD3723E:37b-27: byang chub sems dpa' 'dul dbang gis //
T02TD3723E:37b-28: rngon dang smad 'tshong ston pa ltung //
T02TD3723E:37b-29: khe dang spyod pa de min phyir //
T02TD3723E:37b-30: thabs chen lam la gnas pa'i phyir //
T02TD3723E:37b-31: skye bo kun gyis bya bar 'byung //
T02TD3723E:37b-32: ga na'i dam tshig chen po ni //
T02TD3723E:37b-33: log par chags yid g-yo spangs pa'i //
T02TD3723E:37b-34: don gnyis mngon du 'dod pa'i mis //
T02TD3723E:37b-35: pad can dung can ri mo can //
T02TD3723E:37b-36: ba lang can dang lcug phran ma //
T02TD3723E:37b-37: sdod cig mi reg phyal ba brgyad //
T02TD3723E:37b-38: mnyen dang ske ring stod smad phyed //
T02TD3723E:37b-39: yan lag phra 'jam tshigs mig zlum //
T02TD3723E:37b-40: dpral ba'i dbyes phye smin dkyus ring //
T02TD3723E:37b-41: dmig phrag dkyil na autpal mdog / chu zheng gnyis ka 'bring du bshad //
T02TD3723E:37b-42: lus la chu klung ga pur dri //
T02TD3723E:37b-43: gsang thub shes rab spyod pa dal //
T02TD3723E:37b-44: dad ldan 'grogs shing yid dang che //
T02TD3723E:37b-45: gsang ba'i gnas su spyad par bya'o //
T02TD3723E:37b-46: dbang bskur dam dbog chos gsum bshad //
T02TD3723E:37b-47: lus la rigs lnga'i rdul tshon dgye //
T02TD3723E:37b-48: thabs la mkhas pas skabs kyis sbyar //
T02TD3723E:37b-49: dam tshig rnam grangs bcu gnyis kyi //
T02TD3723E:38a-1: grub yon tan bsam mi khyab //
T02TD3723E:38a-2: slob bu smin cing las rnams 'grub //
T02TD3723E:38a-3: skye gnas ngan 'gro rigs su nges //
T02TD3723E:38a-4: thabs kyi theg pa 'dir bshad do //
T02TD3723E:38a-5: mtshan nyid cha dang rnam grangs dang //
T02TD3723E:38a-6: ltos pa'i kun brtags rnam pa gsum //
T02TD3723E:38a-7: dngos po de nyid las brdzun zhes //
T02TD3723E:38a-8: thams cad rang rig snang phyir bden //
T02TD3723E:38a-9: shes nas kun smra skyes bu'i yul //
T02TD3723E:38a-10: dkon mchog gsum dang slob dpon mched //
T02TD3723E:38a-11: sems can gnod par 'ongs pa la //
T02TD3723E:38a-12: brdzun du smra ba'i tshig dag bya //
T02TD3723E:38a-13: gang la gsang bar bya rnams dang //
T02TD3723E:38a-14: gsang bcu la 'dri brdzun bcu smra //
T02TD3723E:38a-15: bsrung ba bcu bdun nyams su blang //
T02TD3723E:38a-16: zhing bcur gyur pa'i nor bcu dang //
T02TD3723E:38a-17: mtshan ldan gzungs dang bkra shis rdzas //
T02TD3723E:38a-18: sbas chos phal 'chang byin can rdzas //
T02TD3723E:38a-19: bsrung ba yod dang med pa'i gter //
T02TD3723E:38a-20: phyug po ser snas bcings pa'i nor //
T02TD3723E:38a-21: ming gis blangs la tshogs su bsngo //
T02TD3723E:38a-22: dam tshig bcu bdun spyad par bya //
T02TD3723E:38a-23: zhing bcur gyur pa'i sems can la //
T02TD3723E:38a-24: brlang tshig bcu yis zhe bcad de //
T02TD3723E:38a-25: drag shul spyod pa'i sngags dag dang //
T02TD3723E:38a-26: gzungs la brlang po'i sbyor tshig dang //
T02TD3723E:38a-27: slob bu snod ces zhe gcod dang //
T02TD3723E:38a-28: 'byung bo zhe gcod rngam pa'i sgra //
T02TD3723E:38a-29: snod ldan bu la blang chos bshad //
T02TD3723E:38a-30: dag gi dam tshig bco lnga bsrung //
T02TD3723E:38a-31: mi spang dam tshig bshad par bya //
T02TD3723E:38a-32: yang dag dug lnga log dug lnga //
T02TD3723E:38a-33: bshad pa'i thabs mkhas 'dod chags dang //
T02TD3723E:38a-34: 'dod spyod sems kyi rgyan shes nas //
T02TD3723E:38a-35: shin tu zhen pa'i lam du gsungs //
T02TD3723E:38a-36: zhing bcu rlag byed zhe sdang gcod //
T02TD3723E:38a-37: ltas ngan 'joms pa de bzhin te //
T02TD3723E:38a-38: thabs la mkhas pas spyod pa yin //
T02TD3723E:38a-39: mngon bar mtho ba'i lta ba dang //
T02TD3723E:38a-40: ting 'dzin nges par sran tshugs dang //
T02TD3723E:38a-41: shin tu rgyal ba'i mchog tu gsungs //
T02TD3723E:38a-42: lta bas phyogs rigs mi 'byed pa //
T02TD3723E:38a-43: spyod pas blang dor mi byed pa //
T02TD3723E:38a-44: theg pa chen po'i gti mug go //
T02TD3723E:38a-45: lta spyod dman la phrag dog cing //
T02TD3723E:38a-46: dam ma 'dres sogs spong byed pas //
T02TD3723E:38a-47: phrag dog dam tshig bsrung ba'o //
T02TD3723E:38a-48: log dug sems can kun ldan pas //
T02TD3723E:38a-49: dug lnga rang rig rang ldan phyir //
T02TD3723E:38a-50: dran pa thams cad shes pa las /
T02TD3723E:38b-0: @38b shes pa thams cad rtsol ba yin //
T02TD3723E:38b-1: rtsol ba'i sems phyir thabs mkhas pas //
T02TD3723E:38b-2: thabs mkhas rang rig ye shes te //
T02TD3723E:38b-3: nyi ma'i dkyil na mun med ltar //
T02TD3723E:38b-4: rig la rang snang ma gtogs pa //
T02TD3723E:38b-5: nyon mongs 'khor ba rang gis med //
T02TD3723E:38b-6: de shes ye shes rang rig las //
T02TD3723E:38b-7: spang bar bya ba dmigs mi 'gyur //
T02TD3723E:38b-8: dam tshig bco lnga gnas pa yi //
T02TD3723E:38b-9: rnal 'byor chen po'i don gnyis rdzogs //
T02TD3723E:38b-10: kun gyis blang ba'i dam tshig lnga //
T02TD3723E:38b-11: dri chen dri chu mang sa dang //
T02TD3723E:38b-12: zil pa lhag pa'i sems rnams dang //
T02TD3723E:38b-13: grub pa bzhi yis brgyan pa'i phyir //
T02TD3723E:38b-14: nad lnga bsal phyir blang ba dang //
T02TD3723E:38b-15: gtsang sme rtog sbyang phyir blang dang //
T02TD3723E:38b-16: thun mong dgos pa lnga phyir dang //
T02TD3723E:38b-17: rigs lnga grub pa'i yon tan no //
T02TD3723E:38b-18: sdug bsngal las grol dngos grub thob //
T02TD3723E:38b-19: bcud ldan btung lnga lam gyi mchog / thabs kyi lus la brten shes na //
T02TD3723E:38b-20: yon tan brjod las 'das par gsungs ;
T02TD3723E:38b-21: / phye ba'i dam tshig gsum cu gnyis //
T02TD3723E:38b-22: skabs kyis dang du blang bar bya'o //
T02TD3723E:38b-23: bsgrub par bya ba rnam lnga la //
T02TD3723E:38b-24: rigs dang ye shes yab yum la //
T02TD3723E:38b-25: gcig la'ang lnga ldar shes par bya //
T02TD3723E:38b-26: sku dang gsung thugs yon tan la //
T02TD3723E:38b-27: gcig la'ang lnga lngar phye bas na //
T02TD3723E:38b-28: bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i bye brag rnams //
T02TD3723E:38b-29: mtshan nyid shes nas bsgrub par bya //
T02TD3723E:38b-30: shes pa lnga las bye brag tu //
T02TD3723E:38b-31: phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga //
T02TD3723E:38b-32: dbang po yul dang yan lag go //
T02TD3723E:38b-33: nyon mongs dam rdzas sha dang ni //
T02TD3723E:38b-34: phyogs dang kha dog 'gro ba dang //
T02TD3723E:38b-35: snyigs ma bag chags lnga lnga'o //
T02TD3723E:38b-36: bdun cu la sogs 'khor ba'i chos //
T02TD3723E:38b-37: ye shes sku rigs yab yum sogs //
T02TD3723E:38b-38: rang gzhan ngang gis skur dag la //
T02TD3723E:38b-39: blo la nyams su lon pa ni //
T02TD3723E:38b-40: spyod yul yang dag rnal 'byor pa'o //
T02TD3723E:38b-41: thun mong dam tshig mdor bsdu na //
T02TD3723E:38b-42: bdag gzhan don du shes par bya'o //
T02TD3723E:38b-44: chang dang dregs spyod khengs sems dang //
T02TD3723E:38b-45: che dag dge smod sdig spyod dang //
T02TD3723E:38b-46: le lo ser sna gnyid g-yeng dang //
T02TD3723E:38b-47: khro gtum ye shes sngon mi gtong //
T02TD3723E:38b-48: bka' bcag sdig pa'i grogs bsten dang //
T02TD3723E:38b-49: bag med spyod dang dam chos 'dor //
T02TD3723E:39a-0: chog mi shes dang rngom la @39a * //
T02TD3723E:39a-2: / sbang bya nyi shu gcig bzlog pa //
T02TD3723E:39a-3: bdag don mchog tu gyur pa ste //
T02TD3723E:39a-4: kun gyis bdag nyid bkur bar gyur //
T02TD3723E:39a-5: pha rol phyin drug chos spyod bcu //
T02TD3723E:39a-6: rnam bzhi las kyi spyod pa dang //
T02TD3723E:39a-7: mthun 'jug las kyi spyod pa ni //
T02TD3723E:39a-8: theg pa dgu dang mu stegs dgu//
T02TD3723E:39a-9: 'gro ba drug ge spyod pa rnams //
T02TD3723E:39a-10: 'dzin dang nyam nga med par spyod //
T02TD3723E:39a-11: don 'gyur ci yang nyams su blang //
T02TD3723E:39a-12: bzhi bcu bzhi la sogs pa yis //
T02TD3723E:39a-13: gdul bya gang yang dor mi bya //
T02TD3723E:39a-14: bsrung ba de dag grangs btab pa //
T02TD3723E:39a-15: dran dang shes bzhin gyis spyod pa //
T02TD3723E:39a-16: rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen por gsungs //
T02TD3723E:39a-17: nyams par gyur ba'i rgyu dag ni //
T02TD3723E:39a-18: mi chos blon po las byed dang //
T02TD3723E:39a-19: bdag bstod gzhan smod gzung 'dzin mkhas //
T02TD3723E:39a-20: khengs dregs gnyis phyir 'du ba ste //
T02TD3723E:39a-21: rdzas la chags sems rang phyogs che //
T02TD3723E:39a-22: chang dang rang mthong lta spyod snyoms //
T02TD3723E:39a-23: chos la phyogs ris ngoms skyen dang //
T02TD3723E:39a-24: gsang chung le lo gtsang sme che //
T02TD3723E:39a-25: sgro skur grogs kyi nyams len dang //
T02TD3723E:39a-27: gcig pur mi dga' 'du la dga' //
T02TD3723E:39a-28: nyi shu nyams pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
T02TD3723E:39a-29: snga rtags sngon du 'byung ba ni //
T02TD3723E:39a-30: nyam nga ba yi nad rnams dang //
T02TD3723E:39a-31: dgra bgegs gnyis la bde mi 'jug /'khor dang longs spyod yid 'ong 'bral //
T02TD3723E:39a-32: ya ga ma nyes la sogs 'byung //
T02TD3723E:39a-33: brtsams pa'i las la 'bras med cing //
T02TD3723E:39a-35: gal te nyams la rtags med par //
T02TD3723E:39a-36: legs par snang na mi rung ste //
T02TD3723E:39a-37: bde ba zad med gtan du sdug / gal te nyams la rtags byung na //
T02TD3723E:39a-38: sngon gyi rnam smin zad 'gyur phyir //
T02TD3723E:39a-39: bskang ba'i las rnams brtson byas na //
T02TD3723E:39a-40: ngan song sdug bsngal myong mi 'gyur //
T02TD3723E:39a-41: nyams par gyur pa'i skyon bshad pa //
T02TD3723E:39a-42: byang sems dam tshig nyams gyur na //
T02TD3723E:39a-43: bskal par dge ba ci bsags kyang //
T02TD3723E:39a-44: gzhi rten med par gyur pa yis //
T02TD3723E:39a-46: sku yi dam tshig nyams gyur na //
T02TD3723E:39a-47: ya nga'i nad sogs sdug bsngal 'byung //
T02TD3723E:39a-48: dus min tshe zad bar chad mang //
T02TD3723E:39a-49: bskal par rdo rje dmyal bar ltung //
T02TD3723E:39b-0: bde bas rab tu @39b brel bar 'gyur //
T02TD3723E:39b-1: gsung gi dam tshig nyams gyur na //
T02TD3723E:39b-2: bgegs rnams thogs med 'ong ba dang //
T02TD3723E:39b-3: rkyen dang ye 'drog mang ba dang //
T02TD3723E:39b-4: chos la byin rlabs med 'gyur zhing //
T02TD3723E:39b-5: bskal pa gnyis su dmyal bar ltung //
T02TD3723E:39b-7: thugs kyi dam tshig nyams gyur na //
T02TD3723E:39b-9: myos shing skur pa'i gnas su 'gyur //
T02TD3723E:39b-10: gang yang bsgrubs la rtags med cing //
T02TD3723E:39b-11: lce la zhing rmo la sogs pa'i //
T02TD3723E:39b-12: dmyal bar bskal pa gsum la gnas //
T02TD3723E:39b-13: rtsa ba kun nyams phal pa dag / gso la nye bar mi brtson na //
T02TD3723E:39b-14: rdo rje dmyal bar de ltung ste //
T02TD3723E:39b-15: dmyal ba phal pa thams cad kyi //
T02TD3723E:39b-16: sdug bsngal gcig tu bsdoms pas ni //
T02TD3723E:39b-17: de yi 'bum gyi char mi phod //
T02TD3723E:39b-18: sangs rgyas stong gi 'od zer dang //
T02TD3723E:39b-19: byang chub sems dpa'i phrin las kun //
T02TD3723E:39b-20: rgyun du mdzad kyang phan mi 'gyur //
T02TD3723E:39b-21: bskal pa ther 'bum la sogs su ;
T02TD3723E:39b-22: / de ni thon par mi 'gyur te //
T02TD3723E:39b-24: se gol gcig gis phyin par byed //
T02TD3723E:39b-25: de bas shin tu nan tan gyis //
T02TD3723E:39b-26: yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na //
T02TD3723E:39b-27: longs spyod mang du 'phel ba med //
T02TD3723E:39b-28: theg pa che la 'phyas dogs shing //
T02TD3723E:39b-29: thun mong mchog gi dngos grub rnams //
T02TD3723E:39b-30: shin tu ring bar gyur ba dang //
T02TD3723E:39b-31: gdul bya'i don rnams yal 'gyur zhing //
T02TD3723E:39b-32: lta spyod ya char gyur pa yis //
T02TD3723E:39b-33: theg pa phyi nang 'dres pa nyid //
T02TD3723E:39b-34: bka' yi byin nyams 'grub par dka' //
T02TD3723E:39b-35: srung ba'i lha rnams g-yel ba dang //
T02TD3723E:39b-36: zab mo'i chos las ring 'gyur zhing //
T02TD3723E:39b-37: bskal par ngan song ltung bar 'gyur //
T02TD3723E:39b-39: rnal 'byor skyes bu chen po yis //
T02TD3723E:39b-40: dam tshig ma nyams gzhung mthun dang //
T02TD3723E:39b-41: lus la nad nyung mtshan ldan zhing //
T02TD3723E:39b-42: thun mong nyes byas dag par 'gyur //
T02TD3723E:39b-43: srid pa gsum la dbang bsgyur zhing //
T02TD3723E:39b-44: theg chen zab mo'i don thob gyur //
T02TD3723E:39b-45: gsung gis lha mnyes rgyud 'phel zhing //
T02TD3723E:39b-46: mthu dang byin rlabs bsam mi khyab //
T02TD3723E:39b-48: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs //
T02TD3723E:39b-49: thugs kyi skyo dub med pa dang //
T02TD3723E:40a-2: dgongs zab don la mkhas pa dang //
T02TD3723E:40a-3: lha rnams kyis ni dbang bskur 'gyur //
T02TD3723E:40a-4: yan lag dam tshig ma nyams na //
T02TD3723E:40a-5: skyon bzlog pa nyid yon tan 'gyur //
T02TD3723E:40a-6: bdud bzhi bcom zhing ngan song skyob //
T02TD3723E:40a-7: theg chen lta spyod gzhung bsrang bas ;
T02TD3723E:40a-9: don gnyis yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur //
T02TD3723E:40a-10: theg chen dam tshig la gnas na //
T02TD3723E:40a-12: bsrung ba med par thub pas na //
T02TD3723E:40a-13: dge slong byang chub sems dpa' dang //
T02TD3723E:40a-15: nyams na bskang ba'i thabs rnams ni //
T02TD3723E:40a-16: byang chub sems kyi dam nyams na //
T02TD3723E:40a-17: mkhas la gnas te gnas par bya //
T02TD3723E:40a-18: sku yi dam tshig nyams gyur na //
T02TD3723E:40a-19: gang la nyams pa der song la //
T02TD3723E:40a-20: nor rdzas mnyes pa der phul nas //
T02TD3723E:40a-21: gang nyes tshig tu bshags byas la//
T02TD3723E:40a-22: phyin chad sdom pa legs par bca' //
T02TD3723E:40a-23: gal te grongs chad gyur pa na //
T02TD3723E:40a-24: de yi slob dpon bzhugs pa la //
T02TD3723E:40a-25: dam tshig gong ma bzhin du bshags //
T02TD3723E:40a-26: med na mnyam pa brgya la bshags //
T02TD3723E:40a-27: de yang rnyed par ma gyur na //
T02TD3723E:40a-28: de dang mnyam pa gsum bkug la //
T02TD3723E:40a-29: sbyin sreg me thab rab brtsigs nas //
T02TD3723E:40a-30: dkyil 'khor lha la mchod rjes su //
T02TD3723E:40a-31: spyan drangs gsang mchan la sogs mchod //
T02TD3723E:40a-32: gong du smos pa'i yon rnams kyang //
T02TD3723E:40a-33: mnyam po gsum la dbul bar bya //
T02TD3723E:40a-34: gal te gus par mi len na //
T02TD3723E:40a-35: gnyis ka rdo rje dmyal bar skye //
T02TD3723E:40a-36: de pas myur du tshangs par bya /
T02TD3723E:40a-37: gsung gi dam tshig nyams gyur na //
T02TD3723E:40a-38: sgo gsum sku gsung thugs nyid du //
T02TD3723E:40a-39: nges par shes te skong par 'gyur //
T02TD3723E:40a-40: bzlas pa sngags kyis bsab pa dang //
T02TD3723E:40a-41: sgrub pa chen po gsum gyis bskang //
T02TD3723E:40a-42: thugs kyi dam tshig nyams gyur na //
T02TD3723E:40a-43: 'gro drug sems su gsal rtogs na //
T02TD3723E:40a-44: bdag nyid bdag la bsab par byed //
T02TD3723E:40a-45: mi rtog ting 'dzin rlung zhugs te //
T02TD3723E:40a-46: ma yengs blo la 'dris par bya'o //
T02TD3723E:40a-47: yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na //
T02TD3723E:40a-48: gang 'das de nyid sor bcug la //
T02TD3723E:40a-49: brgya rtsa brgyad kyi tshogs kyis bskang //
T02TD3723E:40a-50: de ltar nyams su blangs na skong //
T02TD3723E:40b-1: dam tshig chen po dpes bstan pa //
T02TD3723E:40b-2: sa gzhi lta bu'i rang bzhin pas //
T02TD3723E:40b-3: lam dang 'bras bu'i chos rnams kun //
T02TD3723E:40b-4: dam tshig med par 'byung mi srid //
T02TD3723E:40b-5: sa mtha'i mkhar gyi rang bzhin pas //
T02TD3723E:40b-6: bsrung ba thub dang ma thub las //
T02TD3723E:40b-7: legs nyes stongs chen spyod pa'o //
T02TD3723E:40b-8: rin chen lta bu'i rang bzhin pas //
T02TD3723E:40b-10: nam mkha' lta bu'i rang bzhin pas //
T02TD3723E:40b-12: rno dpal mtshon gyi rang bzhin pas //
T02TD3723E:40b-13: 'khor ba'i dra ba gcod pa la //
T02TD3723E:40b-14: pha ma lta bu'i rang bzhin pas //
T02TD3723E:40b-15: dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad bskyed //
T02TD3723E:40b-16: rgya mtsho lta bu'i rang bzhin bas //
T02TD3723E:40b-17: rlabs chen dus dus 'byung bar byed //
T02TD3723E:40b-18: me dpung lta bu'i rang bzhin pas //
T02TD3723E:40b-19: gang mtsho thams cad tshig par 'gyur //
T02TD3723E:40b-20: de bzhin rtsi snan rang bzhin pas //
T02TD3723E:40b-22: rgyal po lta bu'i rang bzhin pas //
T02TD3723E:40b-24: rgya mtsho nor len ded dpon dang //
T02TD3723E:40b-25: thog ma nas mthar 'dis phyin pas //
T02TD3723E:40b-26: 'di la shin tu nan tan bya'o //
T02TD3723E:40b-27: dam tshig dam tshig ces bya ba //
T02TD3723E:40b-28: gud na yod pa ma yin te //
T02TD3723E:40b-29: rang gi sems nyid dam tshig yin //
T02TD3723E:40b-30: ji snyed snang ba'i chos rnams kun //
T02TD3723E:40b-31: rang rig rkyen bral nyid snang bas //
T02TD3723E:40b-32: cir snang cir srid rang rig nyid //
T02TD3723E:40b-33: 'gro ldog spyi tshugs gang yong yang //
T02TD3723E:40b-34: snying po'i don las 'da' mi srid //
T02TD3723E:40b-35: rang bzhin dam tshig chen po yid //
T02TD3723E:40b-36: rang bzhin lhun grub dam chig la //
T02TD3723E:40b-37: rigs pas phyin ci ma log na //
T02TD3723E:40b-38: mngon snang gdags pa'i chos med pas //
T02TD3723E:40b-39: lta ba'i dam tshig chen por bshad //
T02TD3723E:40b-40: de dag blo la 'dris pa yis //
T02TD3723E:40b-41: spyod lam kun yang ma nyams par //
T02TD3723E:40b-42: ting 'dzin rgyud kyi dam tshig ste //
T02TD3723E:40b-43: sangs rgyas nyid dang spyod yul gcig /'di la bsrung ba ci yang med //
T02TD3723E:40b-44: nyams pa rdul tsam 'byung mi srid //
T02TD3723E:40b-46: lhag pa'i dam tshig rnam bzhi ldan //
T02TD3723E:40b-48: dam tshig kun gyi mdo zhes so //
T02TD3723E:41a-0: sgyu 'phrul rnam dpyod gtor tshogs rgya mtsho'i rgyud chen @41a * //
T02TD3723E:41a-2: / lam 'bras snying po me long bcu gcig gis mtshan pa //
T02TD3723E:41a-3: 'khor ba'i dang mchu'i tshul gyis sgeg pa'i blos bsdus pa'i //
T02TD3723E:41a-4: dge rtsa sa kun kyang dam gnas 'gro kun byang chub shog spyi'i dam tshig mdor bsdus pa dpal sgeg pa'i rdo rjes mdzad pa dam tshig chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
